Bash(git --git-dir=../LIFE_TRACKING-fix-progress/.git --work-tree=../LIFE_TRACKING-fix-progress commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: okr progress rollup + clarify goal hours tracking

OKR Progress improvements:
- Add detailed debug logging for progress calculations
- Implement hours-based progress fallback when no KeyResults/targetValue
- Calculate actual hours spent from completed timeBlocks
- Enhanced UI shows planned vs actual hours for all goals
- Added efficiency metrics (progress per hour invested)
- Hours-based progress indicator for goals without KeyResults

Progress calculation now works in 3 modes:
1. Traditional KeyResult currentValue/targetValue (existing)  
2. Hours-based: actualHours/plannedHours when no targetValue
3. Hybrid: shows both KeyResult progress + hours efficiency

UI improvements:
- Show actual hours spent alongside planned hours
- Progress source indicator (KeyResults vs Hours-based)
- Efficiency ratio displayed when applicable
- Color-coded progress information for clarity

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
